resources.string: Carnivals are a haven for blitz, glamour, fashion and style. You\'ve got to have them all if you want to rock the ramp and prove your haute couture quotient in Ã€ La Mode. Come with every bit of pizzazz you possess! Impress the crowd and the judges, and become the style icon of Effervescence 2016!
This is a sample rule. This is a sample rule

Effervescence is a platform of youthful energy showcasing intellectuals, creativity and a cultural treat. The cultural and managerial spirits mingle to bring forth the fizz, frolic and festivity of this extravaganza. Effervescence is cultural extravaganza spanning 3 days of high octane action. The three days of campus events which comprise of informal and other events in the morning and to hold the night fever we have a full platter of dance, dramatics music and literary competitions. The concluding night of the Effervescence is always the most anticipated and illustrious event which has seen bands like Bombay Vikings, Euphoria Silk Route and Strings (to name a few) performing live. This Effervescence is going to take the definition of fun to a whole new dimension! So, don\'t wait anymore. Join us this October in celebrating the occasion of absolute fun and entertainment. Management events, workshops informals, dance , drama, music , rock night celebrity night , etc. Pick up anything you are interested in!. there\'s something for everyone. So, block your calendars from 14th to 17th october and be a part of Effervescence.
